title: Team Solid Engagement LF Plat++ Mid Laner
body:
Hey guys

Solid engagement Recently new team of plats looking for a strong mid lane who can develop and build Synergy  and communication with the team. atm we are doing practing in rank 5s and scrims 3-4 days a week 5pm onwards aussie time. We are looking for a guy who friendly and doesnt rage and actually committed to stick with the team threw wins and losses. we are here to learn and develope as a team to build strong team to enter in future tournaments. sorry for my spelling or english doing it well wasted but NEED A MID LANER WHO GOOD!! 

Current Rostor
Top:inaryuubi
Jungle:Perfect
Mid:TBC
Adc:Eadweald
Support:Fishey


If you think your the player then feel free to leave a comment or add me in game eadweald Hopefully find the right player soon!!

replies.body:
Previously **Platinum I **in Season 5, and also have a plat V smurf.
When I play ranked I generally play mid or sup
My Mid champions include (but are not limited to):

Jayce Anivia
Leblanc Katarina
Ziggs Ahri
Syndra Xerath

I don't rage at all, in fact I have never gotten a chat restriction or anything like that. My timezone is ACST (Adelaide time), i'm not sure what timezone your team is, but I'm sure we could work things out :3 .
I also have Skype, Mumble and could download Teamspeak if necessary.
If you're interested, add me on my main: **Blizzard9789**

Was plat season 4. I've played in many experienced teams, so I know the ins and outs of 5s play. 
Position:  mid
Champion: fully fledged Katarina main, I can adjust to play any other mid laner to a good standard if needed.
age: 17

I'm more than happy to make spare time to play on a 5s team. Add me if you're interested: WQLFY.

Hey last season challenger ranked team/diamond in preseason
im in plat atm plan on getting diamond soon
main jungle and mid
skype: emmettvonschreiber
age: 16
can grind rank all next week 24/7 for challenger ranked team XD
large champion pool

Hey im p1 ADC ( However do know all roles and could possibly play Mid to standard)  the mids i play are Ori, Lb, Jayce, i can learn others if needed (Most likely will be ) i would like to try out if possible
